songs.title: Beat U Pussies Up
songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Big Scoob]
Yeah Imma call this one the old nigga track, you dig?
Cause I'm on some old nigga shit on this one, know what I mean?
I ain't with this new funny style of rap shit these niggas is on, man
I think Imma rock a throwback jerzy in this bitch, nigga
And Imma keep it that way

[Chorus: Big Scoob]
I'll beat these pussys up
I'll beat these pussys up
I'll beat these pussys up
I'll beat these pussys up
I'll beat these pussys up

[Verse 1: Big Scoob]
Lil rap niggas, lil jeans, lil shirt
Lil money, lil work, lil terf
Lil boys, lil skemes, lil hood dreams
I'm a big boy, all I do is big things
And these gang niggas, never did a thing niggas
Only wrote a song, now they sware they bang niggas
I ain't with it man, came up with a different brand
Real niggas, real killers, really silly, man
Yeah nigga, I been meeting in this rap shit
Run from niggas, but they sware they on some trap shit
Ain't that, I sware them niggas on these pussy games
Straight tricks, but they sware they straight players, man
Bullshit ain't nothing to a real boss
Real feends bring real heat, that's real talk
See me in the club, holla, tip a cup
Just remember if you trippin

[Chorus: Big Scoob]
I'll beat these pussys up
I'll beat these pussys up
I'll beat these pussys up
I'll beat these pussys up
I'll beat these pussys up

[Interlude: Glasses Malone]
Scoob do it for the OGs
I do it for the YGs and BGs
G Malone, check it

[Verse 2: Glasses Malone]
Fall into the funk shit
Niggas talking, but they ain't saying nothing
2 pistols, simpley saying "boom"
I came motherfucker, give me your wrent
Player shit, know who you're dealing with, man?
Had a Holliwood bitch eating that tan
And don't supersize shit
Ever seen a pare of supers like this?
I doubt it, bitch I'm bout it
Desert Egle 44, but I'm the same without it
Locked out, dark like Wesley Snipes
Bumpin lodies at the gage of westlife
Knocked a young bitch, so it's no rest tonight
Leave this restaurant, we the best and get it it right
Fake nigga rush in, acting like he wanna fight
Grab my gun and my knife, and nigga

[Chorus: Big Scoob]
I'll beat these pussys up
I'll beat these pussys up
I'll beat these pussys up
I'll beat these pussys up
I'll beat these pussys up

[Outro: Krizz Kaliko]
Dope Talk Vol 2
Kali baby
We in the building man
Big Scoob
Glasses Malone
We beat these pussys up
Well, y'all beat these pussys up
I don't know what I'm talking bout
